title: General Grant National Memorial: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations           Official Invitation. Manhattan Hunter Science High School / Nick Kozak  "Taken for Grant-ed"  A Video Festival of Student Work about U.S. Grant In the spring of 2016, students of art history at Manhattan Hunter Science High School wrote, directed, and produced short documentaries on the life of Ulysses S. Grant and the General Grant National Memorial. The documentaries were unveiled to the public on April 21, 2016, as a signature event for National Park Week, during the centennial of the National Park Service.  Watch the all the videos!               The National Parks of New York Harbor Video Series  The National Parks of New York Harbor includes 23 unique destinations, all of them easy to reach by subway, car or ferry.  This series of video podcasts is a great way to introduce yourself to some of these wonderful places. Start clicking today!                        Building Grant's Tomb Donations from thousands of grateful Americans built a magnificent memorial for President and Mrs. Ulysses S. Grant.  Duration:3 minutes, 31 seconds
